// MOCK DATA FOR PHASE 1
// This simulates what would come from backend APIs in Phase 2

// Sample Services/Doctors
export const mockServices = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Dr. Rajesh Kumar",
    type: "Dentist",
    price: 500,
    duration: 30, // in minutes
    description: "Expert in dental care and cosmetic dentistry",
    experience: "10 years",
    image: "üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è"
  },
  {

    type: "Cardiologist",
    price: 1000,
    duration: 45,
    description: "Heart specialist with advanced cardiac care",
    experience: "8 years",
    image: "üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è"
  },
  {

    name: "Hair Studio Pro",
    type: "Salon - Hair Cut",
    price: 300,
    duration: 45,
    description: "Premium haircut and styling service",
    experience: "5 years",
    image: "üíá"

  {

    duration: 30,
    description: "Skincare treatments and consultations",
    experience: "6 years",

  {

    duration: 60,
    description: "One-on-one fitness and wellness coaching",
    experience: "7 years",
    image: "üèãÔ∏è"
  }
];

// Sample Time Slots (for a selected service)
export const mockTimeSlots = [
  { id: 1, time: "09:00 AM", available: true },
  { id: 2, time: "09:30 AM", available: false }, // Already booked
  { id: 3, time: "10:00 AM", available: true },
  { id: 4, time: "10:30 AM", available: true },
  { id: 5, time: "11:00 AM", available: false },
  { id: 6, time: "02:00 PM", available: true },
  { id: 7, time: "02:30 PM", available: true },
  { id: 8, time: "03:00 PM", available: false },
  { id: 9, time: "03:30 PM", available: true },
  { id: 10, time: "04:00 PM", available: true },
];

// Sample User Appointments (already booked)
export const mockAppointments = [
  {
    id: 1,
    serviceName: "Dr. Rajesh Kumar",
